channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SOLR-15969] Backup Tests cannot use SimpleCodec
item.description:
Reproduce with: gradlew :solr:modules:hdfs:test --tests "org.apache.solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore.test" -Ptests.seed=7102F921739005DD

   >     java.lang.AssertionError: Backup failure: zh expected null, but was:<codec footer mismatch (file truncated?): actual footer=808464432 vs expected footer=-1071082520 (resource=BufferedChecksumIndexInput(MMapIndexInput(path="/Users/mdrob/code/solr/solr/modules/hdfs/build/tmp/tests-tmp/solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore_7102F921739005DD-006/tempDir-002/node1/HdfsBackupRestore_shard1_replica_n1/data/index/_0.dii")))>
   >         at __randomizedtesting.SeedInfo.seed([7102F921739005DD:F956C6FBDD6C6825]:0)
   >         at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:89)
   >         at org.junit.Assert.failNotNull(Assert.java:756)
   >         at org.junit.Assert.assertNull(Assert.java:738)
   >         at org.apache.solr.handler.BackupStatusChecker._checkBackupSuccess(BackupStatusChecker.java:207)
   >         at org.apache.solr.handler.BackupStatusChecker.checkBackupSuccess(BackupStatusChecker.java:187)
   >         at org.apache.solr.handler.BackupStatusChecker.waitForBackupSuccess(BackupStatusChecker.java:96)
   >         at org.apache.solr.handler.BackupStatusChecker.waitForBackupSuccess(BackupStatusChecker.java:72)
   >         at org.apache.solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore.test(TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore.java:198)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: warper krisden - does this reproduce for either of y'all?
Yes it reproduces. Without the seed it passes. From a quick glance, I'm not sure how this is related to moving the HDFS classes so trying to pinpoint the issue.

2> 6700 ERROR (CreateSnapshot) [] o.a.s.h.SnapShooter Exception while creating snapshot
  2>           => org.apache.lucene.index.CorruptIndexException: codec footer mismatch (file truncated?): actual footer=808464432 vs expected footer=-1071082520 (resource=BufferedChecksumIndexInput(MMapIndexInput(path="/Users/mdrob/code/solr/solr/modules/hdfs/build/tmp/tests-tmp/solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore_7102F921739005DD-006/tempDir-002/node1/HdfsBackupRestore_shard1_replica_n1/data/index/_0.dii")))
  2>    at org.apache.lucene.codecs.CodecUtil.validateFooter(CodecUtil.java:584)
  2> org.apache.lucene.index.CorruptIndexException: codec footer mismatch (file truncated?): actual footer=808464432 vs expected footer=-1071082520 (resource=BufferedChecksumIndexInput(MMapIndexInput(path="/Users/mdrob/code/solr/solr/modules/hdfs/build/tmp/tests-tmp/solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore_7102F921739005DD-006/tempDir-002/node1/HdfsBackupRestore_shard1_replica_n1/data/index/_0.dii")))
  2>    at org.apache.lucene.codecs.CodecUtil.validateFooter(CodecUtil.java:584) ~[lucene-core-9.0.0.jar:9.0.0 0b18b3b965cedaf5eb129aa41243a44c83ca826d - jpountz - 2021-12-01 14:23:49]
  2>    at org.apache.lucene.codecs.CodecUtil.checkFooter(CodecUtil.java:432) ~[lucene-core-9.0.0.jar:9.0.0 0b18b3b965cedaf5eb129aa41243a44c83ca826d - jpountz - 2021-12-01 14:23:49]
  2>    at org.apache.solr.core.backup.repository.BackupRepository.copyIndexFileFrom(BackupRepository.java:241) ~[solr-core-10.0.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:10.0.0-SNAPSHOT cb2e58f6569704c45387a8d094625ba8e014776b [snapshot build, details omitted]]
  2>    at org.apache.solr.core.backup.repository.HdfsBackupRepository.copyIndexFileFrom(HdfsBackupRepository.java:194) ~[main/:10.0.0-SNAPSHOT cb2e58f6569704c45387a8d094625ba8e014776b [snapshot build, details omitted]]
  2>    at org.apache.solr.core.backup.repository.BackupRepository.copyFileFrom(BackupRepository.java:203) ~[solr-core-10.0.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:10.0.0-SNAPSHOT cb2e58f6569704c45387a8d094625ba8e014776b [snapshot build, details omitted]]
  2>    at org.apache.solr.handler.SnapShooter.createSnapshot(SnapShooter.java:269) ~[solr-core-10.0.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:?]
  2>    at org.apache.solr.handler.SnapShooter.createSnapshot(SnapShooter.java:158) ~[solr-core-10.0.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:?]
  2>    at org.apache.solr.handler.SnapShooter.lambda$createSnapAsync$1(SnapShooter.java:225) [solr-core-10.0.0-SNAPSHOT.jar:?]
  2>    at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:829) [?:?]

I went back to an older commit before the hdfs move to a module and this seed still fails:

solr git:(f19b9e86e32) ./gradlew test --tests "org.apache.solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore.test" -Ptests.seed=7102F921739005DD

I wonder if this relates to the codec endian change.

Its interesting this is checking the input file and has nothing to do with HDFS:

https://github.com/apache/solr/blame/main/solr/core/src/java/org/apache/solr/core/backup/repository/BackupRepository.java#L241

where "is" is a local file reference.

I am not any closer to figuring this out yet, but I'm 100% sure it has nothing to do with the HDFS module or even HDFS in general

I googled the same footer checksum and there are a bunch of failures similar:

  • https://dev.lucene.apache.narkive.com/49NfsqWK/jenkins-lucene-solr-6-x-macosx-64bit-jdk1-8-0-build-133-failure
    • This is from 6.x - 6 years ago
  • https://lists.apache.org/thread/9rghsw20hf6fb7f75s372r3wm5rzq563
  • https://www.mail-archive.com/builds@solr.apache.org/msg04834.html

also found SOLR-7980 - which is ~6 years old

What is absolutely fascinating to me is that the magic that is read is 808464432 which translates to:

  • binary = 0b00110000_00110000_00110000_00110000
  • hex = 0x30303030

This is really interesting since what is the chance we end up with exactly that footer magic each time. This is even before/after the endian switch in Lucene - so we are ending up with the same bits even read little vs big endian.

If I add a call to CheckIndex after the call to BackupRestoreUtils.indexDocs then that comes back clean. But if I manually call CodecUtil.checkFooter right after that then I get the same error.

Same file, which also happens to be the first file alphabetically.

This is so weird:

7323 INFO  (TEST-TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore.test-seed#[7102F921739005DD]) [] o.a.s.h.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore codec footer mismatch (file truncated?): actual footer=808464432 vs expected footer=-1071082520 (resource=BufferedChecksumIndexInput(MMapIndexInput(path="/Users/mdrob/code/solr/solr/modules/hdfs/build/tmp/tests-tmp/solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore_7102F921739005DD-022/tempDir-002/node1/HdfsBackupRestore_shard1_replica_n1/data/index/_0.dii")))
7323 INFO  (TEST-TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore.test-seed#[7102F921739005DD]) [] o.a.s.h.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore codec footer mismatch (file truncated?): actual footer=808464432 vs expected footer=-1071082520 (resource=BufferedChecksumIndexInput(MMapIndexInput(path="/Users/mdrob/code/solr/solr/modules/hdfs/build/tmp/tests-tmp/solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore_7102F921739005DD-022/tempDir-002/node1/HdfsBackupRestore_shard1_replica_n1/data/index/_0.dim")))
7323 INFO  (TEST-TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore.test-seed#[7102F921739005DD]) [] o.a.s.h.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore codec footer mismatch (file truncated?): actual footer=808464432 vs expected footer=-1071082520 (resource=BufferedChecksumIndexInput(MMapIndexInput(path="/Users/mdrob/code/solr/solr/modules/hdfs/build/tmp/tests-tmp/solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore_7102F921739005DD-022/tempDir-002/node1/HdfsBackupRestore_shard1_replica_n1/data/index/_0.fld")))
7323 INFO  (TEST-TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore.test-seed#[7102F921739005DD]) [] o.a.s.h.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore codec footer mismatch (file truncated?): actual footer=808464432 vs expected footer=-1071082520 (resource=BufferedChecksumIndexInput(MMapIndexInput(path="/Users/mdrob/code/solr/solr/modules/hdfs/build/tmp/tests-tmp/solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore_7102F921739005DD-022/tempDir-002/node1/HdfsBackupRestore_shard1_replica_n1/data/index/_0.inf")))
7324 INFO  (TEST-TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore.test-seed#[7102F921739005DD]) [] o.a.s.h.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore codec footer mismatch (file truncated?): actual footer=808464432 vs expected footer=-1071082520 (resource=BufferedChecksumIndexInput(MMapIndexInput(path="/Users/mdrob/code/solr/solr/modules/hdfs/build/tmp/tests-tmp/solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore_7102F921739005DD-022/tempDir-002/node1/HdfsBackupRestore_shard1_replica_n1/data/index/_0.len")))
7324 INFO  (TEST-TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore.test-seed#[7102F921739005DD]) [] o.a.s.h.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore codec footer mismatch (file truncated?): actual footer=808464432 vs expected footer=-1071082520 (resource=BufferedChecksumIndexInput(MMapIndexInput(path="/Users/mdrob/code/solr/solr/modules/hdfs/build/tmp/tests-tmp/solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore_7102F921739005DD-022/tempDir-002/node1/HdfsBackupRestore_shard1_replica_n1/data/index/_0.pst")))
7324 INFO  (TEST-TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore.test-seed#[7102F921739005DD]) [] o.a.s.h.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore codec footer mismatch (file truncated?): actual footer=808464432 vs expected footer=-1071082520 (resource=BufferedChecksumIndexInput(MMapIndexInput(path="/Users/mdrob/code/solr/solr/modules/hdfs/build/tmp/tests-tmp/solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore_7102F921739005DD-022/tempDir-002/node1/HdfsBackupRestore_shard1_replica_n1/data/index/_0.si")))
7325 INFO  (TEST-TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore.test-seed#[7102F921739005DD]) [] o.a.s.h.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore Computed correct footer for BufferedChecksumIndexInput(MMapIndexInput(path="/Users/mdrob/code/solr/solr/modules/hdfs/build/tmp/tests-tmp/solr.handler.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore_7102F921739005DD-022/tempDir-002/node1/HdfsBackupRestore_shard1_replica_n1/data/index/segments_2"))
7328 INFO  (TEST-TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore.test-seed#[7102F921739005DD]) [] o.a.s.h.TestHdfsBackupRestoreCore class org.apache.lucene.store.BufferedChecksumIndexInput cannot seek backwards (pos=-16 getFilePointer()=0)

Well figured it out I think. There are a bunch of 

@SolrTestCaseJ4.SuppressCodecs({"SimpleText"}) // Backups do checksum validation against a footer value not present in 'SimpleText'

or similar throughout the code base. It looks like SimpleText codec doesn't have a footer and that explains why this works without the seed.

I'm planning to run through the tests forcing SimpleText as a codec.

./gradlew test -Ptests.codec=SimpleText

and see what else pops out as potentially needing the suppression. Based on the linked jira and other mailing list items - there are probably other suppressions needed.
Based on our conversation in Slack I already ran everything through SimpleText. PR posted!
